title: DONZAKA
author: DONZAKA
content: Creating post and good content comes to me easily but i have had just one question on my mind since i signed up, "How do i grow my merit level the same way my activities and post are growing?Please, i would appreciate good pointers.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Stop thinking about that and browse the forum for learning. That's the easiest way to get the maximum merit.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: First of all, it's best to know that making up to nine or ten posts in less than 2 hours won't be good for your account as it can be considered as an act of spamming, so it's best you change your posting habit. if you check my signature space you'll see the forum rules and regulation so go through it and learn what's accepted in the forum and what's not. As for the merit earning, there's no pattern or should I say a tutorial on how one should go about if they wish to earn merit but you should consider contributing to the forum and also in discussions that you engage in, and for you to do that you'll have to acquire knowledge about Bitcoin or crypto as a whole. You can still check my signature space for Ratimov's encyclopedia link.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: DONZAKA on April 28, 2023, 11:10:20 AMCreating post and good content comes to me easily but i have had just one question on my mind since i signed up, "How do i grow my merit level the same way my activities and post are growing?Please, i would appreciate good pointers. You can read this thread to learn more about merits and activities https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2766177.0 it constitute all you could ever wanted to ask, secondly before you can go further in making post, you need to read this before posting https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0 this link gives you a comprehensive pattern of how you're expected to post to meet up the forum standard, in this, you will understand what a quality post mean and how you can post as such, the quality of your post will place you on a good stand to receive merits from members as your activities keep increasing in respect to increasing numbers of your post, while on every two weeks interval, your activities increases by 14 provided that you have posted upto 14 or more every two weeks, merit and activities are the parameters that set your growth in ranks.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: First of all, you should forget about getting merits but seek for knowledge in the forum. The forum is filled with so much knowledge that you can tap from by reading and learning about bitcoin. Also make your own research to gain more knowledge. Start by reading every pinned thread in the various boards to learn about the forum and have more knowledge about the discussions on that board. Your contributions to topic discussed and information will earn you merits. If you put merits first,you might get caught up with plagiarism. Create topics that forum members can learn something from. No hurry in life, learning is a gradual process,we all started like you.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: DONZAKA on April 28, 2023, 11:10:20 AMCreating post and good content comes to me easily but i have had just one question on my mind since i signed up, "How do i grow my merit level the same way my activities and post are growing?If someone send you 2 merits, you will automatically have 1 sendable merit (smerits). If you have 4 merits, you will also have 2 smerits that you can send. Quality posts can be  given merits. Make quality posts. Post more on bitcoin boards.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on April 28, 2023, 11:11:41 AMStop thinking about that and browse the forum for learning. That's the easiest way to get the maximum merit.This is the best response that will help you because it is better for you to learn by yourself and not to be spoon feed by some response. However you only have 14 activities and that is barely two weeks of being here and why the rush. Take time to read and study the platform before searching for ways to jump at merit. It comes easily sometimes, you can read on this  board

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: DONZAKA on April 28, 2023, 11:10:20 AMCreating post and good content comes to me easily but i have had just one question on my mind since i signed up, "How do i grow my merit level the same way my activities and post are growing?Please, i would appreciate good pointers. I think I should ask you this question, why do you want your merits to grow? I believe if you are on the forum and all what you are after is merits, then you won’t get the merits and you might end up going against the forum rules maybe by plagiarizing and you get banned or maybe by spamming.If you want your merits to keep on increasing, then just make sure you start making positive contribution to the forum, make quality posts and make useful comments, anyhow that think your posts is useful to him and worth meriting will merit you and your merits will be growing gradually but don’t be desperate.Don’t plagiarize because you want to make quality posts, if you are making a post and you know the post is not yours, just make sure you quote the part you copied and make sure you add source link and you are safe, you won’t punished if you add source link and you quote where you copied and you will be given merits if anybody thinks it worth it.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Creating posts is normal but to have good content in it needs to have knowledge about that particular topic so it's not much difficult nor very easy.If you are saying that you can do it then you don't have to worry about merits because you will get them through your posts which will automatically reflect your quality and knowledge.But if you are saying earning merits at faster pace like keeping pace with activity points then there are members who are doing it well like PowerGlove who have gain lot of merits but their activity is very low but if you have look at their post quality you will find how it's possible.You are expecting to get 14 merits each fortnight as activity distribution period so you have to earn them with good posts.If you think you have good posts and not being recognised there are different threads to help you out where you can submit your posts for merit evaluation like these mentioned below :[Merit] Share your best posts/threads with Fillippone to be merit assessed[Merit] Help newbies and those who have a little left to the next rank[self-moderated] Report unmerited good posts to Merit SourceYou can deliver your best but having much expectations and solely focusing on earning merits won't help you so get to learning and enhancing your knowledge.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: DONZAKA on April 28, 2023, 11:10:20 AMCreating post and good content comes to me easily but i have had just one question on my mind since i signed up, "How do i grow my merit level the same way my activities and post are growing?Please, i would appreciate good pointers. You won't grow anything writing in capital letters.First, try to understand what exactly merit means. The forum and the ranking on the forum did not arise because of merit, but the opposite. It is necessary to relax and enjoy the forum, and the merits will come by themselves."Meaning of merit in English - the quality of being good and deserving praise:" https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/merit

comments.author: bangjoe
comments.body: Quote from: DONZAKA on April 28, 2023, 11:10:20 AMCreating post and good content comes to me easily but i have had just one question on my mind since i signed up, "How do i grow my merit level the same way my activities and post are growing?Please, i would appreciate good pointers. Don't focus on increasing rank but focus on increasing knowledge as a means for you to make it easier for you to understand what other people are saying, merit will come to you if you make a reply or post that deserves to be given merit by other users.Good posts do not mean quality, everyone can make good posts according to themselves but not necessarily from other users, right? Good and quality posts in the view of other users, for example, like me when judging other people's posts, I see whether they are useful or not for me and your posting forum.Keep the spirit and fear to explore the forum and continue to contribute, there are many opportunities to earn merit.Like here, Ratimov, Fillippone and many more, so don't be lazy to explore the forums and contribute to the forum..

comments.author: yudi09
comments.body: Quote from: DONZAKA on April 28, 2023, 11:10:20 AMCreating post and good content comes to me easily but i have had just one question on my mind since i signed up, "How do i grow my merit level the same way my activities and post are growing?Please, i would appreciate good pointers. Many times we want to say that don't give priority to thoughts like that because it will become an obstacle for you and other beginners to develop.Just do things that make you grow personally by reading a lot, discussing so that it will bring new ideas and solutions that are useful for all people.This advice may have been repeatedly reminded by members who are very experienced for members like you who raise topics like this.What is very important in our opinion is the goal and being consistent with the goal itself. If the goal is only to pursue merit, change your thoughts in a better direction for self-development.

comments.author: reizella28
comments.body: I think it doesn't really matter as long people see your quality posts and informative conversation then probably you will get merit. People are not selfish as long they see you contributed here they will give it to you. This is my first time having a merit and I'm so proud since I'm not even good at english grammar I still can communicate with other people and tell them my ideas with a certain topic.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: You must follow your logic. If you are confident that you can easily create good-quality posts, then accordingly, your merits will come to you for your efforts.Make simple calculations; if you have no merit, then not everything is so simple in your posts. Above all, tell us why you are here.

comments.author: Wakate
comments.body: Quote from: DONZAKA on April 28, 2023, 11:10:20 AMCreating post and good content comes to me easily but i have had just one question on my mind since i signed up, "How do i grow my merit level the same way my activities and post are growing?Please, i would appreciate good pointers.  This is one of the funny questions I always laugh at because it is out of desperation to rank up so you can join signature campaign without even trying as much to calm down or make an impact in this community. Asking this question is not bad but it should how concerned you are in getting ranked so can start earning from the community with just few activities. You need to make an impact in the community so you can be relevant not being desperate to each the next level without any input. You need to keep writing good posts that are of advantage to the community. Getting merited depends on the merit source that will find your post relevant and worthy of having merits.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: I just saw all the posts you've made since registering on the forum, if I'm not mistaken you're from Nigeria. People from your country who have been on the forum for a long time have become active members here, they are also among the most contributing members to the forum. Learn self taught from them how to earn merit to increase your account ranking.Quality posts are subjective, you don't have to make 12 posts a day just to get Merit. Try to contribute to the forum by sharing something that can add insight to other people, that way merit will come to you.

comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: Quote from: DONZAKA on April 28, 2023, 11:10:20 AMCreating post and good content comes to me easily but i have had just one question on my mind since i signed up, "How do i grow my merit level the same way my activities and post are growing?Please, i would appreciate good pointers. merit is not something that is easy to get, there are rules that must be met so that your account is worthy of merit. study accounts that get a lot of merit, do you see their posts look normal, Besides that, don't chase merit too much because you will always fail to get it.I commented a little about your posting habits, the way you make posts can be called burst posts and that is a bad habit, I suggest making posts about 25 minutes between your old and new posts, don't let your account get into trouble because of spam posts. I hope you can learn from senior members of the Nigerian board.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Keeping your merit at the same level as your activity means you must put more effort into your post quality, and with good logic and motivation, you can do it. If you can earn at least 14 merits in every two weeks, then you are good.You can use this thread as motivation for yourself, but make sure you don't spam or plagerize.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Quote from: DONZAKA on April 28, 2023, 11:10:20 AMCreating post and good content comes to me easily but i have had just one question on my mind since i signed up, "How do i grow my merit level the same way my activities and post are growing?Please, i would appreciate good pointers. How to grow you activities: 1: be active and contributing by posting quality content both in ideas and helping other members of the forum solving they various cryptocurrency and other related  issues. 2: keep being active continuously for up to 14+ because the forum activities are calculated on a 14-day base and this is based on the number of posts which must be up to 14 and above also. 3: also note that 1post=1activities so for you to become a so to rank up to the next your posts must meet up to the activities completed with the merit requirement for your rank, you can see the number of both merits and activities needed for each rank in the forum.
